Our Services

From patios and driveways to complete garden renovations, we deliver quality landscaping services across Petersfield and Hampshire.

Patios

Transform your outdoor space with a stunning new patio. We specialise in porcelain paving, Indian sandstone, and natural stone patios built to last.

  • ✓ Proper groundwork and drainage
  • ✓ Premium quality materials
  • ✓ Bespoke designs to suit your garden

Driveways

Quality driveway installations that improve your home's kerb appeal. From block paving to resin driveways, we deliver lasting results.

  • ✓ Block paving specialists
  • ✓ Resin bound driveways
  • ✓ Proper sub-base preparation

Fencing

Professional fencing installation using concrete posts and gravel boards. Built properly to stand the test of time.

  • ✓ Gates and side access

Decking

Create an outdoor living space with quality decking. We install composite and timber decking with proper sub-frames and drainage.

  • ✓ Low-maintenance finishes
  • ✓ Pergolas and balustrades
